# EDTR

EDTR is a premium, browser-based online notepad inspired by the simplicity and legendary utility of Notepad++. It is designed for developers, writers, and power users who need a zero-friction, blazingly fast writing and coding environment.

## Project Structure
- Landing Page (Home): https://edtr.cc (or root)
- Main Editor: https://edtr.cc/notepad

## Key Features
- **Notepad++ Inspired**: Clean, minimalistic, and focused on utility.
- **Autosave**: Instant data persistence to `localStorage` every 5 seconds.
- **Privacy First**: All data is stored locally in the browser. No server-side storage or tracking.
- **Syntax Highlighting**: Support for 20+ programming languages (JS, TS, Python, Go, Rust, etc.).
- **Code Formatting**: One-click formatting with support for JSON and other languages.
- **PWA Support**: Fully installable as a Progressive Web App for desktop and mobile.
- **Word Count**: Real-time line, character, and word count.
- **Print & PDF**: Native document printing and PDF export.
- **Sidebar Management**: Intuitive file and folder structure for managing multiple notes.
- **Dark Mode**: Native light and dark theme support.
- **Browser-Based**: Works in all modern browsers without login or registration.

## Technical Stack
- Next.js (App Router)
- React
- Tailwind CSS
- Lucide Icons
- Highlight.js (Syntax Highlighting)
- Shadcn UI
- HTML5 LocalStorage API
